title: Sound Healing with Didgeridoo, Gong and Crystal Bowls
description: Sound Healing with Didgeridoo, Gong and Crystal Bowls Hosted By Andrea Gabriel. Event starts on Wednesday, 20 September 2023 and happening at Raising Vibrations Yoga Studio, Carmel, WA. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Wed Sep 20 2023 at 07:00 pm to 08:00 pm (GMT+08:00) Raising Vibrations Yoga Studio, 53 Union Road, Carmel, Australia Our beautiful Sound Healing with Didgeridoo, Gong, Crystal and the very powerfully healing Peter Hess Bowl experience, plus many other divine musical instruments to create a harmonic vibration of peace, love and healing is happening again. Start the day to cleanse your body and mind with a cosmic emersion of sound. Immerse yourself in the healing vibration of sound meditation to elevate your being and soothe your soul. Raising Vibrations Yoga Studio now has a sound session that will help you journey within and facilitate deep relaxation. The beautiful crystal bowls emit an expansive sound that is healing for the body's deeper tissues. Evocative of ancient temples, the delightful sounds of the crystal and Tibetan bowls exude a profound healing matrix. They are grounding and help promote a stable, peaceful energy. A gong is an ideal tool for stress reduction, stimulation of the glandular system and to clear emotional blockages. The gong resonates all cells of the body simultaneously helping to bring into balance the energy centers (chakras) of the body in a most powerful and effective way. Benefits of Gong and Crystal Bowl Healing are: Stress Relief Mental Clarity Improved Sleep Pain Relief Heightened awareness of self Increased Creativity Rejuvenation The didgeridoo produces a primal sound that originates from the dawn of time. It promotes an extremely relaxed calm feeling that allows listeners to enter a deep meditative state that enhances the body's natural healing abilities. Along with this primeval sound, the didgeridoo also produces low-frequency vibrations that provide a no-touch massage when played over the recipient, delivering a wide range of healing benefits. Once a month experience the power of Meditation, Breath, Crystal Bowl, Gong and Didgeridoo Sound Healing and Deep Relaxation. Event Details: Wednesday, 20th September 7:00pm - 8:00pm Raising Vibrations Yoga Studio 53 Union Road, Carmel WA 6076 Price: $35.00/ per person Also check out other [Health & Wellness Events in Orange Grove](https://allevents.in/orange%20grove-wa/health-wellness?ref=ep_desc_also). Tickets for Sound Healing with Didgeridoo, Gong and Crystal Bowls can be booked here. |Ticket Information||Ticket Price| |General Admission||AUD 35| Stay tuned with the most relevant events happening around you. Attend, Share & Influence! E.g. Jack is first name and Mandanka is last name.
